"},{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Gemini modifies breeding to always produce twins."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.gemini_shamir.1"}]}]

sections.name: page_1
pages: ["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"The Gemini Shamir is found on Barimium Bands. It can be placed onto hoes.\n\nHolding the hoe in the offhand will cause any bred animals to produce identical twins."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.gemini_shamir.2"}]}]
